text: Maloja () is a district of the canton of Graubünden, Switzerland. It has an area of and a population of 17,810 people (as of December 2004). Most of the population of Maloja speaks Italian. It contains 2 Kreise (sub-districts) and 16 municipalities: Bergell sub-district Municipality Population (31 December 2004) Area (km²) Bondo 207 28.21 Castasegna 194 6.76 Soglio 181 67.64 Stampa 575 94.74 Vicosoprano 463 54.01 Oberengadin sub-district Municipality Population (31 December 2004) Area (km²) Bever 646 45.65 Celerina/Schlarigna 1,306 24.03 La Punt-Chamues-ch 682 63.22 Madulain 186 16.35 Pontresina 1,877 118.24 St. Moritz 5,084 28.69 Samedan 2,828 113.97 S-chanf 675 137.90 Sils im Engadin/Segl 716 63.54 Silvaplana 966 44.71 Zuoz 1,224 65.62
title: Maloja District
